# n8n_workflow (Data Source)

Fetches a single n8n workflow by ID

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Workflow identifier

### Read-Only

- `active` (Boolean) Whether the workflow is active
- `name` (String) Workflow name
